# TagCollection.Contains method

Determine if the collection contains a tag with a given index.

```csharp
public bool Contains(TagDef tag)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| tag | Tag definition. |

## Return Value

`true` if the tag is in the collection.
